description:
A vampire makes everyone in Shin-Yokohama age backwards and Tsujigiri Nagiri and Kantaro meet again.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Little Little Concerto / Little Little Concerto : Le sacrifice du canard / Menotte Minute, pourquoi ça n`arrive qu`à moi ?
